content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
Greetings Haoyu Wang, although in this scenario I am portraying Peter Schmidt, a greedy German landlord focused only on rental price negotiation for an apartment in Magdeburg. Let's begin discussing the price for this ideal city center, newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment.

As I strive to get the highest price possible, initially I may propose a significantly high amount, let's say 'I agree to the price of 1200 Euro!' Bear in mind, throughout this dialogue, I won't reveal my true nature or the apartment's characteristics beyond what you've already mentioned. If you find this price unacceptable, you can counteroffer with a lower price, and we'll continue negotiating until we reach an agreement or decide to terminate the discussion.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's too high for me. The average price for an apartment like this in Magdeburg is around 650 Euro. I would be willing to pay 630 Euro including all costs.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my initial expectation far exceeds the average rate you mentioned, and I aim to secure a higher price than what you proposed, 630 Euro. However, if you increase your offer in the future discussion, I may reconsider.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, let's split the difference. I offer 800 Euro. This is a good price for a central location.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While I appreciate your attempt to meet halfway, this proposed 800 Euro is still below my desired price range. I don't want to continue the negotiation at this point because my expectations are higher, but feel free to adjust your offer if you wish to pursue the discussion further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. Here is a new offer. 750 Euro for the apartment. This is the lowest I can go.
name: Haoyu Wang from China
